title: Liam Payne and Maya Henry get intimate on Instagram as romance heats up
text:

Liam Payne and Maya Henry have turned up the heat on their romance with a PDA packed pic on Instagram .

The 26-year-old former One Direction star has seen his relationship with the 19-year-old model take off in recent weeks, with them making a very public show when they debuted on the red carpet together during Paris Fashion Week.

Fans of the singer have now gone delirious over the latest pic of him with Maya, as he locks lips with his latest beau.

The teenage model certainly seems smitten by Liam and she captioned the pic with "kissypooo" and a kissing emoji.

The couple are seen on a corner sofa with Maya cuddling into Liam as she lays her legs across his midriff.

Liam continues to looked relaxed in the arms of Maya and he recently gushed about how she makes him feel

He told OK! magazine: "She's awesome. It's got to the point with my life where I'm like, screw this - it's not worth my happiness.

(Image: Dave Benett/Getty Images for ESC)

(Image: liampayne/Instagram)

"The difference with her is she's so relaxed that it helps me relax in a situation."

With Liam enjoying life, he has also spoken out about how he co-parents his two-year-old son Bear, with Cheryl.

He said that Bear was lucky as his relatives shower him with gifts at every opportunity.

Liam said: "They buy him stuff all the time. I can’t really say, 'Don’t buy him stuff'. But we were actually talking about it recently, because he has so many toys in the house and I’m like, 'I will literally get him one toy'. Because he doesn’t need loads, he’s got loads."
